Pic, which is produced by Mats Langbacka for Langfilm Productions, stars Erik Lonngren, Patrik Kumpulainen, Niklas Groundstroem, Amanda Ooms, Ping Mon Wallen, Philip Zanden and Sampo Sarkola.
Penned by Jimmy Karlsson and Roland Fauser, the 1939-set drama centers on the friendship and rivalry between two teenage boys living on an isolated island in the Baltic Sea.
